item.description:
Who wants to Rock the Casbah? Well join us on our return to Tangierino for a great Moroccan food and entertainment experience.

PLEASE NOTE OUR SEATING IS 8:00 PM HOWEVER YOU MUST ARRIVE BY 7:45 PM SO WE CAN BE SEATED ON TIME.

Please check out the Tangierino Menu so you're prepared to place your order and we are able to enjoy our meal soon after we're seated.

 

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Five (5) minute walk from Bunker Hill Community College station (orange line).

DRIVING:

Check out Google to plan your driving route. Advise you double check that you've entered addresses correctly and included zip codes, so you arrive at the correct location.

PARKING:

Valet is an option and the cost is $15.

A garage near the USS Constitution ship is NAUTICA GARAGE at 88 Constitution Plaza Charlestown, MA 02129 (617) 337-0068. The parking fee is a flat rate of $5 after 5pm (exactly) until 3am and is a ten minute walk from Tangierino's.

Legal street parking is extremely scarce and nearly impossible to find, especially at this time of day. If you're able to find parking on the street, I suggest you read the street signs to ensure it is a legal space.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced.

I had to provide my credit card for this reservation and will be charged for each cancellation within 24 hours of the reservation.

You MUST be certain you can attend.

Rules for this Meetup:

 

If it is less than 24 hours from the meal and you are not able to attend because of an emergency (and NOT because you have a better offer) or you are running late on the day of the dinner, you MUST call or text me at (617) 445-7549.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first seated basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If the meal is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP and if you answered the RSVP question.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the meal and you have not attended nor contacted me, you will be REMOVED and BANNED from BBLD.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within 24 hours of the reservation and you do not contact me, you will be REMOVED and BANNED from BBLD.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 7:45 PM to welcome you from the restaurant bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Tangierino on Friday January 25th at 8 PM
